name: Lata Mangeshkar
occupation: Playback singer,,  songwriter, , Music composer, , Folk Singer
awards: Bharat Ratna 2001, Padma Bhushan 1969,  Padma Vibhushan 1999,  Dada Saheb Phalke Award 1989,  Maharashtra Bhushan Award 1997,  NTR National Award 1999,  National Film Awards (3), Guinness Book of World Records 1984 (most recorded artist in history 1948-1987)    (These are only main awards)
